text:
notion is more than just a note-taking app and I believe I can show the world cool stuff you can build with it

thoughts?, feedbacks, rotten tomatoes, @_buildspace, @NotionHQ  and everyone https://t.co/14vHSmCqpo

user_info.name: The Founder
